item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-12-12
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-12-12.

This is the last meeting for 2023. Please respond to this poll for 2024 scheduling preferences.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-09-26
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-09-26.

Next meeting (Oct 10) is canceled for the MLIR workshop, and I’ll post an update from that workshop on this blog, hopefully also with a video of the talk that Alex Viand and I will be giving at the LLVM developers meeting.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-29
item.description: Here are the notes from the HEIR meeting on 2023-08-29. There was an issue with the recording, so there is no video recording this week.
